title: Sticky Fingers COD: AA and AI Bot Scan
description: Enhance your gaming experience with advanced AA and AI Bot Scan features.
steps: AA and AI Bot Scan: Utilize advanced anti-recoil and aim assist capabilities with injected AI bot scanning.

title: Sticky Fingers COD: Adjust Anti Recoil
description: Adjust the anti-recoil settings for a smoother gameplay experience.
steps: Hold Melee, Press Up or Down to adjust Anti Recoil.

title: Sticky Fingers COD: Adjust Aim Assist Size
description: Customize the aim assist size to suit your gameplay style.
steps: Hold Melee, Press Left or Right to adjust Aim Assist size.

title: Sticky Fingers COD: Miscellaneous Controls
description: Access additional features like YY Spam and Slide Cancel.
steps: Hold L3, Press Up for YY Spam.
Hold L3, Press Down for Slide Cancel.

title: Sticky Fingers COD: Drive Mode
description: Activate Drive Mode for enhanced mobility.
steps: Hold Right, Press Aim to activate Drive Mode.
Press X/A to deactivate Drive Mode.

title: Sticky Fingers COD: Zombie Aim and Auto Aim
description: Enable specialized aiming modes for different scenarios.
steps: Hold L3, Press Left for Zombie Aim.
Hold L3, Press Right for Auto Aim.

title: Sticky Fingers COD: Display Mod Status
description: Check the status of your mods easily.
steps: On Map button press to display mod status.

title: Sticky Fingers COD: Rapid Fire Quick Toggle
description: Quickly toggle Rapid Fire mode on or off.
steps: Hold Aim, Press D-pad Right to turn Rapid Fire On or Off.
Hold Aim, Press D-pad Down to turn Rapid Fire On or Off.

title: Sticky Fingers COD: Choose Button Layout (PS4)
description: Customize your button layout for PS4.
steps: Hold Menu, Hold Square, Hold Cross, Press Up or Down to choose button layout.

title: Sticky Fingers COD: Choose Button Layout (Xbox)
description: Customize your button layout for Xbox.
steps: Hold Options, Hold X, Hold A, Press Up or Down to choose button layout.

title: Sticky Fingers COD: Save Settings
description: Ensure your settings are saved for future sessions.
steps: Make sure you save settings by holding Melee and pressing Aim.

title: Sticky Fingers Fortnite: AA and AI Bot Scan
description: Enhance your Fortnite experience with advanced AA and AI Bot Scan features.
steps: AA and AI Bot Scan: Utilize advanced anti-recoil and aim assist capabilities with injected AI bot scanning.

title: Sticky Fingers Fortnite: Adjust Anti Recoil
description: Adjust the anti-recoil settings for smoother gameplay.
steps: Hold R3, Press Up or Down to adjust Anti Recoil.

title: Sticky Fingers Fortnite: Adjust Aim Assist Size
description: Customize the aim assist size to suit your gameplay style.
steps: Hold R3, Press Left or Right to adjust Aim Assist size.

title: Sticky Fingers Fortnite: Build Mode and Insta Reset
description: Access additional features like Build Mode and Insta Reset.
steps: Hold L3, Press Up for Build Mode.
Hold L3, Press Down for Insta Reset.

title: Sticky Fingers Fortnite: Drive Mode
description: Activate Drive Mode for enhanced mobility.
steps: Hold Right, Press L2 to activate Drive Mode.
Press X/A to deactivate Drive Mode.

title: Sticky Fingers Fortnite: Insta Swap and Insta Pick Up
description: Enable specialized actions for quick item management.
steps: Hold L3, Press Left for Insta Swap.
Hold L3, Press Right for Insta Pick Up (works when Interact button is held).

title: Sticky Fingers Fortnite: Display Mod Status
description: Check the status of your mods easily.
steps: On Map button press to display mod status.

title: Sticky Fingers Fortnite: Rapid Fire Quick Toggle
description: Quickly toggle Rapid Fire mode on or off.
steps: Hold L2, Press D-pad Right to turn Rapid Fire On or Off.
Hold L2, Press D-pad Down to turn Rapid Fire On or Off.

title: Sticky Fingers Fortnite: Save Settings
description: Ensure your settings are saved for future sessions.
steps: Make sure you save settings by holding R3 and L2.
